mapper.sql: priceId, code, hisMedicineCode, spec, firm, batch, minPackageUnit, priceMinPackage, enable, pharmaciesCode, pharmaciesName, beid
mapper.insert:
insert into bas_price
priceId,
code,
hisMedicineCode,
spec,
firm,
batch,
minPackageUnit,
priceMinPackage,
enable,
pharmaciesCode,
pharmaciesName,
beid,

#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hisMedicineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{firm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{minPackageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update bas_price
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hisMedicineCode = #{hisMedicineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spec = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
firm = #{firm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batch = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
minPackageUnit = #{minPackageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priceMinPackage = #{priceMinPackage,jdbcType=REAL},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pharmaciesCode = #{pharmaciesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pharmaciesName = #{pharmaciesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where priceId = #{priceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_price set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hisMedicineCode = #{hisMedicineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spec = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firm = #{firm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, minPackageUnit = #{minPackageUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priceMinPackage = #{priceMinPackage,jdbcType=REAL}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pharmaciesCode = #{pharmaciesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pharmaciesName = #{pharmaciesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where priceId = #{priceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM bas_price where 1=1 and beid = #{systemSearchFormBean.beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${filter}
select * from bas_price where code = #{code} and beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update bas_price set enable='0' where beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
